mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT ((COUNT(*) + 14) / 15) FROM statements WHERE 1=1 AND company_cd = '00001' AND date >= '2019-11-01' AND date < '2019-12-31' )as pagenum, seq, TO_CHAR(STT.date, 'YY') AS year, TO_CHAR(STT.date, 'MM') AS month, TO_CHAR(STT.date, 'DD') AS date, STT.account_cd, ACC.title as acc_title, STT.customer_cd, CUS.title as cus_title, STT.classify, STT.debtor, STT.creditor, STT.abs, STT.mod_date FROM statements AS STT, account AS ACC, customer AS CUS WHERE 1=1 AND STT.company_cd = '00001' AND STT.date >= '2019-11-01' AND STT.date < '2019-12-31' AND STT.company_cd = CUS.company_cd AND STT.customer_cd = CUS.cus_cd AND STT.account_cd = ACC.acc_cd LIMIT 15 OFFSET ${pagenum} * 15 ORDER BY SEQ ASC
